publ: by Up And Forward Media Group
name: NinoBrown
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A positive flash briefing Alexa skill to help lift your day and put you in the right state of mind when you feel lost or unfocused. Each message will give you the courage to move forward even when the world seems to knock you down. Nino Brown give you the raw uncut truth that we all need in order to get the full message from God. Believe me this is not the average Sunday sermon. I hope that you all enjoy his message.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
